name: mw14
description:
Mw14
1:1
2021
4950x4950px


Colour, form, line, detail if combined in an interesting and surprising way make beauty. That's what I think, anyway. 

Allow your eye to be led around the picture plain. Pay attention to why it chose this route over that. And for a minute or two you’re in another universe. 

A ‘Conceptual Artist’ IRL recently said to me ‘May I ask you a question, other than a retinal sensation, what does your work offer?’ I wonder now if he was being a bit combative. Anyway, it doesn’t matter, my immediate response was ‘Pleasure, my work offers pleasure.’

And the more I think about it the more accurate that spontaneous answer is.
